azurerm_frontdoor_firewall_policy.description: Manages an Azure Front Door Web Application Firewall Policy instance.

name.description: Gets name of the resource that is unique within a policy. This name can be used to access the resource.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

enabled.description: Is the managed rule override enabled or disabled. Defaults to `false`

mode.description: The firewall policy mode. Possible values are `Detection`, `Prevention` and defaults to `Prevention`.

redirect_url.description: If action type is redirect, this field represents redirect URL for the client.

custom_rule.description: One or more `custom_rule` blocks as defined below.

custom_block_response_status_code.description: If a `custom_rule` block's action type is `block`, this is the response status code. Possible values are `200`, `403`, `405`, `406`, or `429`.

custom_block_response_body.description: If a `custom_rule` block's action type is `block`, this is the response body. The body must be specified in base64 encoding.

managed_rule.description: One or more `managed_rule` blocks as defined below.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the Web Application Firewall Policy.

action.description: The action to be applied when the rule matches. Possible values are `Allow`, `Block`, `Log`, or `Redirect`.

priority.description: The priority of the rule. Rules with a lower value will be evaluated before rules with a higher value. Defaults to `1`.

type.description: The name of the managed rule to use with this resource.

match_condition.description: One or more `match_condition` block defined below.

rate_limit_duration_in_minutes.description: The rate limit duration in minutes. Defaults to `1`.

rate_limit_threshold.description: The rate limit threshold. Defaults to `10`.

match_variable.description: The variable type to be excluded. Possible values are `QueryStringArgNames`, `RequestBodyPostArgNames`, `RequestCookieNames`, `RequestHeaderNames`.

match_values.description: Up to `100` possible values to match.

operator.description: Comparison operator to apply to the selector when specifying which elements in the collection this exclusion applies to. Possible values are: `Equals`, `Contains`, `StartsWith`, `EndsWith`, `EqualsAny`.

selector.description: Selector for the value in the `match_variable` attribute this exclusion applies to.

negation_condition.description: Should the result of the condition be negated.

transforms.description: Up to `5` transforms to apply. Possible values are `Lowercase`, `RemoveNulls`, `Trim`, `Uppercase`, `URLDecode` or`URLEncode`.

version.description: The version on the managed rule to use with this resource.

exclusion.description: One or more `exclusion` blocks as defined below.

override.description: One or more `override` blocks as defined below.

rule_group_name.description: The managed rule group to override.

rule.description: One or more `rule` blocks as defined below. If none are specified, all of the rules in the group will be disabled.

frontend_endpoint_ids.description: the Frontend Endpoints associated with this Front Door Web Application Firewall policy.

create.description: Used when creating the FrontDoor Web Application Firewall Policy.

update.description: Used when updating the FrontDoor Web Application Firewall Policy.

read.description: Used when retrieving the FrontDoor Web Application Firewall Policy.

delete.description: Used when deleting the FrontDoor Web Application Firewall Policy.
